sentences.en: China thus agreed with our interpretation that North Vietnamese forces had to vacate Cambodian territory.
sentences.cn: 就这样中国同意了我们的解释,即北越部队应当撤离柬埔塞领土.

sentences.en: Clay will vacate the position on June 19.
Guest is asked to vacate their room before 12:00.
sentences.cn: 客人被要求在中午22点以前退房.

sentences.en: Guests are asked to vacate their room before 12:00.
sentences.cn: 客人被要求在中午12点以前退房.

sentences.en: Guests are requested to vacate their rooms by noon on the day of departure.
sentences.cn: 房客务请在离开之日的中午以前腾出房间。

sentences.en: Guests must vacate their rooms by 11:00.
sentences.cn: 房客必须于11点前腾出房间。

sentences.en: Guests were asked to vacate their rooms before 12.00.
sentences.cn: 客人被要求在中午12点以前退房.

sentences.en: He would like an assurance that other forces will not move into the territory that his forces vacate.
sentences.cn: 他想确保其他势力不会在他的军队撤离后进入这个地区。

sentences.en: His battle lost, Mr Martin will vacate the chair on June 21 st.
sentences.cn: 战斗失败, 马丁先生将在6月21日交出职位.

sentences.en: Hotel guests are requested to vacate their rooms by twelve noon.
sentences.cn: 旅馆的房客按规定要在中午十二点之前退房.

sentences.en: I am checking out tomorrow. What time must I vacate the room?
sentences.cn: 我明天到成都去. 请给我结账好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I'm checking out tomorrow. What time must I vacate the room?
sentences.cn: 我明天要结帐出旅馆. 我必须什么时候腾出房间?

sentences.en: The squatters were ordered to vacate the premises.
sentences.cn: 擅自占房者被勒令迁出.

sentences.en: Want to grow new hair, must vacate a place to it first.
sentences.cn: 要想长出新头发, 就必须先给它腾出地方.

sentences.en: We received a notice to vacate the premises.
sentences.cn: 我们收到了要求腾出住所的通知.

sentences.en: You must vacate the premises in three days.
sentences.cn: 你(们)必须在三天内搬走.

sentences.en: You must vacate your office by tonight.
sentences.cn: 你必须在今夜腾出你的办公室.

trans.tran_cn: 腾出, 空出,离(职),退(位)
trans.tran_en: to leave a job or position so that it is available for someone else to do
to leave a seat, room etc so that someone else can use it
